com.kk08.CyTicketServer.helpers

Class IdHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kk08.CyTicketServer.helpers.IdHelper

  • public class IdHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the helper class that manages all the Rating and Forum custom ids
    Author:
    robertb3@iastate.edu, Robert Brustkern
